entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
